::: {.question-block}

<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); checkAnswerBox('q5', '42')" style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px;">
  <span><strong>What is 6 multiplied by 7?</strong></span>
  <input type="text" id="q5" name="q5" maxlength="5" placeholder="Type numeric" style="width: 90px;" />
</form>

<div id="feedback-q5" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
  The correct answer is <strong>42</strong>: 6 times 7 equals 42.
</div>

:::
